entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
